what: R Wrapper for Firebase Authentication REST API
title: R Wrapper for Firebase Authentication REST API
text: ⚠️ repo now archived #17. Please use {firebase.auth.rest}.⚠️ R wrapper Firebase Authentication REST API. Designed used backend R applications & APIs. frbs enables integrate Firebase Authentication services seamlessly projects, allowing user authentication, account management, authentication-related tasks. Suitable need absolute full control build & customize login & registration process/pages, still using Firebase Auth.

title: R Wrapper for Firebase Authentication REST API
text: can install development version frbs like :

title: R Wrapper for Firebase Authentication REST API
text: Create Firebase project. Grab project’s API key place .Renviron FIREBASE_API_KEY: Restart R session. Connect frontend. Functions package named similarly descriptions Firebase Authentication REST API docs, prefix frbs_. exported ones: frbs_sign_up(): Sign user email/password. frbs_send_email_verification(): Send email verification. frbs_sign_in(): Sign user email & password. frbs_sign_in_anonymously(): Sign user anonymously. frbs_send_password_reset_email(): Send password reset email. frbs_change_email(): Change user email. frbs_change_password(): Change user password. frbs_update_profile(): Update user profile. frbs_delete_account(): Delete user account. frbs_get_user_data(): Get user data firebase. frbs_exchange_custom_token(): Exchange custom token ID refresh token. frbs_exchange_refresh_token(): Exchange refresh token ID token.

title: R Wrapper for Firebase Authentication REST API
text: Examples provided .

title: R Wrapper for Firebase Authentication REST API
text: {firebase} {polished}

Change email — frbs_change_email
text: Change email

title: Change email — frbs_change_email
text: id_token String. Firebase Auth ID token user. email String. User's new email.

title: Change email — frbs_change_email
text: named list following items: localId:	uid current user. email:	User's email address. passwordHash:	Hash version password. providerUserInfo:	named list linked provider objects contain "providerId" "federatedId". idToken:	New Firebase Auth ID token user. refreshToken:	Firebase Auth refresh token. expiresIn:	string	number seconds ID token expires. error: NULL error code response list 2 response error: code: Error code message: Error message

title: Change email — frbs_change_email
text: DISCLAIMER: Changing users's email requires disable email enumeration protection firebase project. recommended. Learn email enumeration protection Visit Firebase Auth REST API docs details

title: Change email — frbs_change_email
code: if (FALSE) { # \dontrun{ # first sign in user and get the 'id_token': user <- frbs_sign_in(email = "user@gmail.com", password = "password") id_token <- user$idToken  # change email: response <- frbs_change_email(   id_token = id_token,   email = "new.email@mail.com" ) response } # }

text: token String. Firebase Auth custom token create ID refresh token pair

title: Exchange custom token for an ID and refresh token — frbs_exchange_custom_token
text: named list following items: idToken:	Firebase Auth ID token generated provided custom token. refreshToken:	Firebase Auth refresh token generated provided custom token. expiresIn:	number seconds ID token expires. error: NULL error code response list 2 response error: code: Error code message: Error message

what: Exchange a refresh token for an ID token — frbs_exchange_refresh_token
title: Exchange a refresh token for an ID token — frbs_exchange_refresh_token
text: Refreshes Firebase ID token

title: Exchange a refresh token for an ID token — frbs_exchange_refresh_token
Exchange a refresh token for an ID token — frbs_exchange_refresh_token
text: refresh_token String. Firebase Auth refresh token.

title: Exchange a refresh token for an ID token — frbs_exchange_refresh_token
text: named list following items: expires_in: number seconds ID token expires. token_type: type refresh token, always "Bearer". refresh_token: Firebase Auth refresh token provided, new refresh token. id_token: Firebase Auth ID token. user_id: uid corresponding provided ID token. project_id: Firebase project ID. error: NULL error code response list 2 response error: code: Error code message: Error message

title: Exchange a refresh token for an ID token — frbs_exchange_refresh_token
text: Visit Firebase Auth REST API docs details

title: Exchange a refresh token for an ID token — frbs_exchange_refresh_token
code: if (FALSE) { # \dontrun{ # first sign in user and get the 'refresh_token': user <- frbs_sign_in(email = "user@gmail.com", password = "password") refresh_token <- user$refreshToken  # exchange the refresh token: response <- frbs_exchange_refresh_token(refresh_token = refresh_token) response } # }

what: Get user data from firebase — frbs_get_user_data
title: Get user data from firebase — frbs_get_user_data
text: Get user data firebase

title: Get user data from firebase — frbs_get_user_data
Get user data from firebase — frbs_get_user_data
text: id_token String. Firebase ID token account.

title: Get user data from firebase — frbs_get_user_data
text: named list following items: users: list length 1 contains nested named list following items: localId: uid current user. email: email account. emailVerified: Whether account's email verified. displayName: display name account. providerUserInfo: Named list provider objects contain "providerId" "federatedId". photoUrl: photo Url account. passwordHash: Hash version password. passwordUpdatedAt: timestamp, milliseconds, account password last changed. validSince: timestamp, milliseconds, marks boundary, Firebase ID token considered revoked. disabled: Whether account disabled . lastLoginAt: timestamp, milliseconds, account last logged . createdAt: timestamp, milliseconds, account created . customAuth: Whether account authenticated developer. error: NULL error code response list 2 response error: code: Error code message: Error message

title: Get user data from firebase — frbs_get_user_data
text: Visit Firebase Auth REST API docs details

title: Get user data from firebase — frbs_get_user_data

title: Perform a Firebase API request — frbs_perform_req
Perform a Firebase API request — frbs_perform_req
text: url_path String. relative path perform request . several valid ones: "/v1/accounts:signUp" "/v1/accounts:signInWithPassword" "/v1/accounts:sendOobCode" "/v1/accounts:sendOobCode" "/v1/accounts:lookup" "/v1/accounts:delete" See Firebase Auth REST API docs valid values data named list. Request body payload. base_url Base url request. Defaults frbs_base_url(). valid ones:

Sign in a user anonymously — frbs_sign_in_anonymously
text: named list following items: idToken: Firebase Auth ID token newly created user. email: Since user anonymous, empty. refreshToken: Firebase Auth refresh token newly created user. expiresIn: number seconds ID token expires. localId: uid newly created user. error: NULL error code response list 2 response error: code: Error code message: Error message

title: Sign in a user anonymously — frbs_sign_in_anonymously
text: use sign users anonymously, must first enable Anonymous sign method firebase project. Go Firebase console check Sign-providers Sign-Methods tab Authentication service make sure Anonymous enabled. Visit Firebase Auth REST API docs details.

text: named list following items: idToken: Firebase Auth ID token newly created user. email: email newly created user. refreshToken: Firebase Auth refresh token newly created user. expiresIn: number seconds ID token expires. localId: uid newly created user. error: NULL error code response list 2 response error: code: Error code message: Error message

title: Update user profile — frbs_update_profile
text: Update user's profile (display name / photo URL).

title: Update user profile — frbs_update_profile
code: frbs_update_profile(   id_token,   display_name = NULL,   photo_url = NULL,   delete_attribute = NULL )

title: Update user profile — frbs_update_profile
text: id_token String.    Firebase Auth ID token user. display_name String.    User's new display name. Defaults NULL. photo_url String.    User's new photo url. Defaults NULL. delete_attribute Character vector attributes delete. Either "DISPLAY_NAME" "PHOTO_URL". nullify values. Defaults NULL.

title: Update user profile — frbs_update_profile
text: named list following items: localId:	uid current user. email:	User's email address. displayName: User's new display name. photoUrl: User's new photo url. passwordHash:	Hash version password. providerUserInfo:	named list linked provider objects contain "providerId" "federatedId". idToken:	New Firebase Auth ID token user. refreshToken:	Firebase Auth refresh token. expiresIn:	string	number seconds ID token expires. error: NULL error code response list 2 response error: code: Error code message: Error message

title: Update user profile — frbs_update_profile
text: Visit Firebase Auth REST API docs details

title: Update user profile — frbs_update_profile
code: if (FALSE) { # \dontrun{ frbs_update_profile(   id_token = "id-token-goes-here",   display_name = "new-user-display-name",   photo_url = "url-to-user-photo" )  # to delete the display name attribute: frbs_update_profile(   delete_attribute = "DISPLAY_NAME" ) } # }
